be.uclouvain.mlg.jForest.splitting.tools

Class CatCount

  • java.lang.Object
    • be.uclouvain.mlg.jForest.splitting.tools.CatCount
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<CatCount>

    public class CatCount
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<CatCount>
    This class defines helper objects that compute class counts/probabilities for a particular level of a categorical variable. (see computational shortcut in CARTSplitter)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CatCount(double level, int c0, int c1)

    • Constructor Detail

      • CatCount

        public CatCount(double level,
        int c0,
        int c1)
        Parameters:
        level - the level of interest of the categorical variable
        c0 - the label of one class
        c1 - the label of the other class
        Preconditions:
        the classification problem should involve only two classes

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public void add(int label)
        Increments the count of one class. Each time the variables takes value level this methods should be called to update the class probabilities.
        Parameters:
        label - either c0 or c1

      • getProb0

        public double getProb0()
        Computes the class probability of c0 based on the observed classes.
        Returns:
        the class probability of c0 or 0 if add(int label) has not been called.

      • getLevel

        public double getLevel()
        Returns:
        the level of interest of the categorical variable

      • getC0

        public int getC0()
        Returns:
        the label of one class

      • getC1

        public int getC1()
        Returns:
        the label of the other class

      • getN0

        public int getN0()
        Returns:
        the number of occurence of class c0

      • getN1

        public int getN1()
        Returns:
        the number of occurence of class c1

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(CatCount o)
        Specified by:
